biotools.summary:
Flexible pipeline for haplotype analysis of multiple linked-read technologies.

The BLR pipeline is end-to-end Snakemake workflow for whole genome haplotyping and structural variant calling from FASTQs, independent of LongRanger.

bioschemas.name: BLR
